info.description: A basic template for managing your project using Golang REST APIs.
info.title: Project Name

post.description: Authenticate and log in a user.
Assaign one tag to a contact.
Assaign one tag to a mailinglist.

CompaniesDetails.description: CompaniesDetails represents detailed information about a specific company.

createdAt.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the company entry was created.

email.description: Email is the email address associated with the company.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the company.

name.description: Name is the name of the company.

website.description: Website is the website URL of the company.

CompaniesPagination.description: CompaniesPagination represents the paginated list of companies.

items.description: Items is a slice containing individual company details.

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of items per page in the pagination.

page.description: Page is the current page number in the pagination.

totalCount.description: TotalCount is the total number of companies in the entire list.

CompaniesTable.description: CompaniesTable represents a single company entry in a table.

createdAt.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the company entry was created.

email.description: Email is the email address associated with the company.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the company.

name.description: Name is the name of the company.

CompanyIn.description: MailinglistIn represents the input structure for creating a new mailinglist.

description.description: Description is the description of the mailinglist.

name.description: Name is the name of the mailinglist.

LoggedIn.description: LoggedIn represents the user details after successful login.

ID.description: ID is the unique identifier for the user.

email.description: Email is the email address of the user.

name.description: Name is the name of the user.

profilePicture.description: ProfilePicture is the URL or path to the user's profile picture.

workCompanyId.description: CompanyID is the unique identifier for the user's company.

LoggedInResponse.description: LoggedInResponse represents the response structure after successful login.

accessToken.description: AccessToken is the token obtained after successful login for authentication purposes.

user.description: User is the structure containing details of the logged-in user.

MailinglistDetails.description: MailinglistDetails represents detailed information about a specific mailinglist.

company_id.description: CompanyID is the ID of the company to which the mailinglist belongs.

contacts.description: Contacts is a list of contacts associated with the mailinglist.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the mailinglist entry was created.

created_by_user.description: CreatedByUserID is the ID of the user who created the mailinglist.

description.description: Description is the description of the mailinglist.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the mailinglist.

name.description: Name is the name of the mailinglist.

tags.description: Tags is a list of tag's UUID associated with the mailinglist.

MailinglistTable.description: MailinglistTable represents a single mailinglist entry in a table.

company_id.description: CompanyID is the ID of the company to which the mailinglist belongs.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the mailinglist entry was created.

created_by_user.description: CreatedByUserID is the ID of the user who created the mailinglist.

description.description: Description is the description of the mailinglist.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the mailinglist.

name.description: Name is the name of the mailinglist.

MailinglistsPagination.description: MailinglistsPagination represents the paginated list of mailinglists.

items.description: Items is a slice containing individual mailinglist details.

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of items per page in the pagination.

page.description: Page is the current page number in the pagination.

totalCount.description: TotalCount is the total number of mailinglists in the entire list.

NotificationsCount.description: NotificationsCount represents the count of notifications.

count.description: Count is the number of notifications.

NotificationsDetails.description: NotificationsDetails represents detailed information about a specific notification.

content.description: Content is the textual content of the notification.

createdAt.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the notification was created.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the notification.

seen.description: Seen is a boolean indicating whether the notification has been seen or not.

type.description: Type is the type or category of the notification.

NotificationsIn.description: NotificationsIn represents the input structure for updating the "seen" status of notifications.

seen.description: Seen is a boolean indicating whether the notification has been seen or not. It is required.

RolesCount.description: RolesCount represents the count of roles.

count.description: Count is the number of roles.

RolesDetails.description: RolesDetails represents detailed information about a specific role.

companyID.description: CompanyID is the unique identifier for the company associated with the role.

companyName.description: CompanyName is the name of the company associated with the role.

createdAt.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the role entry was created.

firstname.description: Name is the name of the role.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the role.

RolesIn.description: RolesIn represents the input structure for creating a new role.

name.description: Name is the name of the role. It is required and should be between 2 and 40 characters.

RolesList.description: RolesList represents a simplified version of the role for listing purposes.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the role.

name.description: Name is the name of the role.

RolesPagination.description: RolesPagination represents the paginated list of roles.

items.description: Items is a slice containing individual role details.

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of items per page in the pagination.

page.description: Page is the current page number in the pagination.

totalCount.description: TotalCount is the total number of roles in the entire list.

RolesTable.description: RolesTable represents a single role entry in a table.

createdAt.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the role entry was created.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the role.

name.description: Name is the name of the role.

Signin.description: Signin represents the information required for signing in.

email.description: Email is the email address of the user. It is required, should be a valid email, and maximum length is 255 characters.

password.description: Password is the user's password. It is required, and its length should be between 10 and 255 characters.

Signup.description: Signup represents the account information for signing up.

companyName.description: CompanyName is the name of the user's company. It is required and should be between 2 and 255 characters.

email.description: Email is the email address of the user. It is required, should be a valid email, and maximum length is 255 characters.

firstName.description: Firstname is the first name of the user. It should be between 3 and 30 characters.

lastName.description: Lastname is the last name of the user. It should be between 3 and 35 characters.

password.description: Password is the user's password. It is required, and its length should be between 10 and 255 characters.

UsersCount.description: UsersCount represents the count of users.

count.description: Count is the number of users.

UsersDetails.description: UsersDetails represents detailed information about a specific user.

country.description: Country is the country of residence of the user.

createdAt.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the user entry was created.

email.description: Email is the email address of the user.

firstname.description: Firstname is the first name of the user.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the user.

lastname.description: Lastname is the last name of the user.

status.description: Status is a boolean indicating the current status of the user.

UsersIn.description: UsersIn represents the input structure for creating a new user.

companyID.description: CompanyID is the unique identifier for the company associated with the user. It is required.

email.description: Email is the email address of the user. It is required, should be a valid email, and maximum length is 255 characters.

firstName.description: Firstname is the first name of the user. It is required and should be between 3 and 30 characters.

lastName.description: Lastname is the last name of the user. It is required and should be between 3 and 35 characters.

password.description: Password is the user's password. It is required, and its length should be between 10 and 255 characters.

UsersList.description: UsersList represents a simplified version of the user for listing purposes.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the user.

name.description: Name is the full name of the user.

UsersPagination.description: UsersPagination represents the paginated list of users.

items.description: Items is a slice containing individual user details.

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of items per page in the pagination.

page.description: Page is the current page number in the pagination.

totalCount.description: TotalCount is the total number of users in the entire list.

UsersTable.description: UsersTable represents a single user entry in a table.

createdAt.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the user entry was created.

email.description: Email is the email address of the user.

firstname.description: Firstname is the first name of the user.

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for the user.

lastname.description: Lastname is the last name of the user.

contacts.ContactDetails.description: ContactDetails represents detailed information about a specific contact.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the contact was created.

tags.description: Tags is a list of tag's UUID associated with the contact.

contacts.ContactIn.description: ContactIn represents the input structure for creating a new contact.

contacts.ContactPaginator.description: ContactPaginator represents the paginated list of contacts.

items.description: Items is a slice containing individual contact details.

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of items per page in the pagination.

page.description: Page is the current page number in the pagination.

totalCount.description: TotalCount is the total number of contacts in the entire list.

contacts.ContactTable.description: ContactTable represents a single contact entry in a table.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the contact was created.

tags.description: List of tag's uuid associated with the contact

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

tags.TagDetails.description: TagDetails represents detailed information about a specific tag.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is the timestamp indicating when the tag was created.

tags.TagIn.description: TagIn represents the input structure for creating a new tag.

tags.TagPagination.description: TagPagination represents the paginated list of tags.

items.description: Items is a slice containing individual tag details.

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of items per page in the pagination.

page.description: Page is the current page number in the pagination.

totalCount.description: TotalCount is the total number of tags in the entire list.

tags.TagTable.description: TagTable represents a single tag entry in a table.
